description: Saved me from having to install another program to mount and unmount ISO images.

So, I have installed this before, I am pretty certain, if not, something very nearly identical. 
Anyway, my point is that this, ONLY by itself has, AFAIK, been all right in the past.  
**HOWEVER**, if you try to run or open Dropbox, it will say that you need a certain additional thing and do you want to install it now? I did, and for the purposes that I needed it for, it worked all right, if a bit clunky, but then I noticed the next day that several dropbox connections keep multiplying!! Had to uninstall Dropbox, and will unfortunately do the same after I submit this.
Для git управление только через контекстное меню, только несколько команд: git log, git push, git pull, create tag. Скудно, не удобно.
